## PaneClassDefinition interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PaneClassDefinition 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [class](./studio.paneclassdefinition.class.md) | string | Each pane has a <code>class</code>, which is a string. |
|  [component](./studio.paneclassdefinition.component.md) | React.ComponentType&lt;{ paneId: string; }&gt; | A react component that renders the content of the pane. It is given a single prop, <code>paneId</code>, which is a unique identifier for the pane.<!-- -->If you wish to store and persist the state of the pane, simply use a sheet and an object. |
